TopicTitle: Forums are in Read Only Mode

Articles.Content:
First off we\'d like to take this time to apologize about the current state of the network, and ask for your patience. For the time being the forums have been placed in Read-Only mode which allows only Mods and Admins to post to help handle the traffic issues and give the server time to process all of the connection requests it\'s receiving. Again, we apologize and ask for your patience while we work to fix the issues keeping Mac users from updating and people from connecting to the forums.

-Damion Rayne
I guess you needed to do what you needed to do.
